data.author: TAN Hongkui
data.message:
Make minRange non-negative

In order to tolerate SICK picoScan150, which could produce LaserScan messages with little negative minRange, and avoid minRange validation failure errors raised by Locator.
Contributed by Fleer David.

Signed-off-by: TAN Hongkui <tanhongkui@qq.com>

data.author: Stefan Laible
data.message:
Update to version 1 4 (#6)

* update module versions check and rename config entries according to Locator version 1.4.2

Signed-off-by: Stefan Laible <stefan.laible@de.bosch.com>

* read sensor offsets and intensities from binary interfaces

Signed-off-by: Stefan Laible <stefan.laible@de.bosch.com>

* functions for readings sensor offsets and intensities

Signed-off-by: Stefan Laible <stefan.laible@de.bosch.com>

* update module versions check in server node

Signed-off-by: Stefan Laible <stefan.laible@de.bosch.com>

* remove unused grid map publisher

Signed-off-by: Stefan Laible <stefan.laible@de.bosch.com>

* add xml suffix to launch files

Signed-off-by: Stefan Laible <stefan.laible@de.bosch.com>

* add interface for second laser

Signed-off-by: Stefan Laible <stefan.laible@de.bosch.com>

* update readme

Signed-off-by: Stefan Laible <stefan.laible@de.bosch.com>

* update bagplayback launch file

Signed-off-by: Stefan Laible <stefan.laible@de.bosch.com>

* use sensor offsets to colorize point cloud

Signed-off-by: Stefan Laible <stefan.laible@de.bosch.com>
